title: RGIPT Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Senior Public Relations Officer Posts
description: Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Petroleum Technology (RGIPT) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Public Relations Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post-Graduation can grab this chance and apply for the RGIPT Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
